content: 1-3 in color a & color b 3 times each 7 color a row in total from base 6 color b row in total from base there are now 12 sts remaining on needles 4 top of hat *slip 1 st knit-wise k1 pass slipped st over knitted st* repeat til end of round there are now 6 sts remaining on needles 5 finishing touches break the yarn thread through sts remaining on needle & be sure to pull tight when closing the top of the beanie weave in the ends & voila 4 3 2 1 thank you this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only i kindly ask that you do not sell any items produced using the directions in this pattern please tag me @juls_wools & use #beaconhillbeanie to show off your creations
